metadata.name: Bad Bone Ballers: Corie Blount Bearcat
metadata.description: This Corie Blount (Chicago Bulls, Los Angeles Lakers) NFT is in collaboration with Bad Bone Ballers is the first NFT in the Bad Bone Ballerâ€™s Special Edition series, featuring the first ever Baller designed by Todd Yarberry & Raine Wilder. This 1/1 Baller depicts his Cincinnati Bearcat roots and is autographed digitally by Corie Blount.
